channel.title: Projects on Jared Goronkin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jared Goronkin

item.title: Echoes in the Mists
item.description: A retro-horror Soulslike built as an RIT capstone project, powered by Mosaic and showcased at GDC and Imagine RIT.

item.title: Data Structure Debug Library
item.description: A C++ debug and visualization tool designed to help students understand data structures in real time, used in SUNY Poly’s CS 240 course.

item.title: Mosaic
item.description: A modular Unity framework for building scalable, reusable gameplay systemsâ€”used in the award-winning Echoes in the Mists and showcased at GDC.
